description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter UI page for managing customers in a beverage distribution management system. It includes a list of customers, search functionality, and a form sheet for creating and editing customer data.

classes.name: CustomersPage
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a page that displays a list of customers with options to add or edit their information.

classes.name: CustomerFormSheet
classes.description: A stateful widget that provides a bottom sheet form for creating or editing a customer's details.

methods.name: _openForm
methods.description: Opens a modal bottom sheet containing the customer form, optionally pre-filled for editing.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the CustomersPage, including app bar, search, customer list, and add button.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form submission by creating or updating a customer in the data service.
